entry.title: Strengthening our legal data infrastructure
entry.summary: With the legal sector generating more and more data, the ODI and Thomson Reuters are exploring which datasets should be open, and how to improve data sharing in the sector. Following a discovery workshop, Amanda Smith invites the community to pitch in ahead of a white paper on strengthening our legal data infrastructure

entry.title: Data infrastructure for investment banking
entry.summary: Investment banks provide financial products and services to clients such as corporations, high-net-worth individuals and governments. Typical services include raising capital, financial advice for mergers and acquisitions and risk management.

entry.title: OpenDataMonitor gathers over 500 open data resources
entry.summary: From the beginning of the open data movement, proponents of the cause have been gathering evidence to demonstrate the economic, social and environmental value of open data. The [OpenDataMonitor project](http://project.opendatamonitor.eu) has gathered a comprehensive, baseline collection of key resources, but we need your help to make it better.

entry.title: New support for European entrepreneurs to access quality open data
Open Data Monitor: one year on
The Share-PSI project: Samos Summit hosts our first workshop
entry.summary: Earlier this month I attended the [5th Samos Summit](http://samos-summit.blogspot.co.uk/), which was co-organised by the [University of Aegean](http://www.aegean.gr/aegean/en/introen.htm), the [Share-PSI 2.0 project](http://www.w3.org/2013/share-psi/) and two policy-focused projects; [NOMAD](http://www.nomad-project.eu) and [EU-Community](http://project.eucommunity.eu/).

entry.title: ODI researchers nominated for Best Paper Award at CeDEM14
entry.summary: ODI Researchers working on the [OpenDataMonitor (ODM)](http://project.opendatamonitor.eu) project were nominated for the Best Paper Award at this years [International Conference for e-Democracy and Open Government (CeDEM)](http://www.donau-uni.ac.at/en/department/gpa/telematik/edemocracy-conference/edem/vid/19486/index.php), held on the 21st - 23rd May.

entry.title: Press release: Research at the ODI - announcing DaPaaS and OpenDataMonitor
entry.summary: ODI awarded European Commission funds to support open data publishers and consumers - new online platforms will help developers and entrepreneurs build applications and businesses.
